Reviews.Title: “Long weekend break at the Bellevue Hotel Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: JanTFishguard
Reviews.Content: 4 stayed hotel december 60th birthday reading reviews sites booked little worried stories mice cramped unfriendly staff bar kettle unusual days fine staff marvellous help mouse seen eat breakfasts brill set day train station road easy journey airport door lovely little bar friendly barman tram stop hotel restaurants walking distance return amsterdam stay

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel, top location, great base for visiting amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: kyla85
Reviews.Content: stayed bellevue 2 weeks ago husband 2 night break originally booked positive reviews read am pleased hotel location fantastic reasonable walking distance hubby walked train station street seen disturbed trams ran outside hotel created disruption bit yes possess honest spent little time actually double bed ours 2 singles pushed wardrobe dressing table free safe flat screen tv fancy ensuite tiny managed fit size cramped mad shower bath amazing interaction staff minimal check perfectly polite cafe ground floor breakfast instead venturing 1 thousands food minutes walk bellevue smelt nice passed pretty busy returned amsterdam stay recommend
